trans-unit.source: reduce applies a function against an accumulator and each element in the array (from left to right) to reduce it to a single value.

trans-unit.source: Here's a minimal implementation of sprintf in JavaScript: it only does "%s" and "%d", but I have left space for it to be extended. It is useless to the OP, but other people who stumble across this thread coming from Google might benefit from it.
trans-unit.target: 这是sprintf在JavaScript中的最小实现：它仅执行“％s”和“％d”，但我留有扩展空间。它对OP毫无用处，但其他偶然发现来自Google的线程的人可能会从中受益。

trans-unit.source: I also have a non-prototype version which I use more often for its Java-like syntax:

trans-unit.source: I did not see the String.format variant:
trans-unit.target: 我没有看到 String.format 变体：

trans-unit.source: I figured that since this, like the older ones, doesn't actually parse the letters, it might as well just use a single token %%. This has the benefit of being obvious and not making it difficult to use a single %. However, if you need %% for some reason, you would need to replace it with itself:
trans-unit.target: 我认为，由于这与较旧的字母一样，实际上并未解析字母，因此最好只使用单个标记 %% 。这具有明显的好处，并且不会很难使用单个 % 。但是，如果由于某些原因需要 %% ，则需要将其替换为自身：

trans-unit.source: I got to this question page hoping to find how to format numbers in JavaScript, without introducing yet another library. Here's what I've found:
trans-unit.target: 我来到了这个问题页面，希望找到如何在JavaScript中格式化数字，而不引入另一个库。这是我发现的：

trans-unit.source: I have a slightly longer formatter for JavaScript here...
trans-unit.target: 我这里的JavaScript格式化程序稍长...

trans-unit.source: I have a solution very close to Peter's, but it deals with number and object case.
trans-unit.target: 我有一个非常接近彼得的解决方案,但它处理的是数字和对象的情况。

trans-unit.source: I realize Microsoft's Ajax library provides a version of String.Format(), but we don't want the entire overhead of that framework.
trans-unit.target: 我意识到Microsoft的Ajax库提供了 String.Format() 的版本，但是我们不希望该框架的全部开销。

trans-unit.source: I use a small library called String.format for JavaScript which supports most of the format string capabilities (including format of numbers and dates), and uses the .NET syntax. The script itself is smaller than 4 kB, so it doesn't create much of overhead.
trans-unit.target: 我为JavaScript使用了一个名为String.format的小型库，该库支持大多数格式字符串功能（包括数字和日期的格式），并使用.NET语法。该脚本本身小于4 kB，因此不会产生太多开销。

trans-unit.source: I use this one:
trans-unit.target: 我用的是这个。

trans-unit.source: I use this simple function:
trans-unit.target: 我用的是这个简单的功能。

trans-unit.source: I want to share my solution for the 'problem'. I haven't re-invented the wheel but tries to find a solution based on what JavaScript already does. The advantage is, that you get all implicit conversions for free. Setting the prototype property $ of String gives a very nice and compact syntax (see examples below). It is maybe not the most efficient way, but in most cases dealing with output it does not have to be super optimized.
trans-unit.target: 我想分享一下我对这个 "问题 "的解决方案。我并没有重新发明车轮,而是试图在JavaScript已经做的基础上找到一个解决方案。这样做的好处是,你可以免费获得所有的隐式转换。设置String的prototype属性$,就可以得到一个非常漂亮而紧凑的语法(见下面的例子)。这也许不是最有效的方法,但在大多数情况下,处理输出时不需要进行超级优化。

trans-unit.source: I'll add my own discoveries which I've found since I asked:
trans-unit.target: 我把我自己的发现补充一下,这是我问过之后的发现。

trans-unit.source: I'm looking for a good JavaScript equivalent of the C/PHP printf() or for C#/Java programmers, String.Format() (IFormatProvider for .NET).
trans-unit.target: 我正在寻找一个等效于C / PHP printf() 或C＃/ Java程序员的 String.Format() （适用于.NET的 IFormatProvider ）的 JavaScript 。

trans-unit.source: I'm surprised no one used reduce, this is a native concise and powerful JavaScript function.
trans-unit.target: 我很惊讶没有人使用 reduce ，这是一种本机简洁而强大的JavaScript函数。

trans-unit.source: I've also aliased with .asFormat and have some detection in place in case there's already a string.format (such as with MS Ajax Toolkit (I hate that library).
trans-unit.target: 我还用.asFormat进行了别名,并且在已经有string.format的情况下也有了一些检测(比如用MS Ajax Toolkit(我讨厌那个库)。

trans-unit.source: If you are looking to handle the thousands separator, you should really use toLocaleString() from the JavaScript Number class since it will format the string for the user's region.
trans-unit.target: 如果要处理千位分隔符，则应该使用JavaScript Number类中的toLocaleString（），因为它将格式化用户区域的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If you prefer not to modify String's prototype:
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想修改 String 的原型：

trans-unit.source: If you really want to do a simple format method on your own, don’t do the replacements successively but do them simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">如果您真的想自己做一个简单的格式化方法，请不要先后进行替换，而要同时进行。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: In contrast with similar solutions in previous replies, this one does all substitutions in one go, so it will not replace parts of previously replaced values.
trans-unit.target: 与以往的答复类似的解决方案对比，这其中做了所有替代一气呵成，所以它不会取代先前所取代值的部分。

trans-unit.target: 万一有人需要一个防止污染全局范围的函数,这里有同样的函数。

trans-unit.source: Maybe it could be even better to deal with the all deeps cases, but for my needs this is just fine.
trans-unit.target: 也许它可以更好地处理全深的情况下,但对于我的需求来说,这就够了。

trans-unit.source: My basic requirement is a thousand separator format for numbers for now, but something that handles lots of combinations (including dates) would be good.
trans-unit.target: 我现在的基本要求是数字的千位分隔符格式,但如果能处理很多组合(包括日期)就好了。

trans-unit.source: Neat.
trans-unit.target: Neat.

trans-unit.source: Normally you would expect the output to be {1}{0} but the actual output is {1}{1}. So do a simultaneously replacement instead like in fearphage’s suggestion.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您希望输出为 {1}{0} ,但实际输出为 {1}{1} 。因此，请同时执行替换操作，如在噬菌体的建议中那样。

trans-unit.source: Note the clever Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments) call -- that means if you throw in arguments that are strings or numbers, not a single JSON-style object, you get C#'s String.Format behavior almost exactly.
trans-unit.target: 请注意聪明的 Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments) 调用-这意味着，如果您抛出的参数是字符串或数字，而不是单个JSON样式的对象，则几乎完全可以得到C＃的 String.Format 行为。

trans-unit.target: JavaScript中的数字格式化

trans-unit.target: JS号码格式化快速教程

trans-unit.source: Reference Pages
trans-unit.target: 参考页

trans-unit.source: Rounding floating-point numbers
trans-unit.target: 浮点数的四舍五入

trans-unit.source: Sadly it seems sprintf doesn't handle thousand separator formatting like .NET's string format.
trans-unit.target: 可悲的是,sprintf似乎不能像.NET的字符串格式那样处理千位分隔符格式。

trans-unit.source: See Kim's answer below for details.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见下面的Kim 答案。

trans-unit.source: That's because Array's slice will force whatever's in arguments into an Array, whether it was originally or not, and the key will be the index (0, 1, 2...) of each array element coerced into a string (eg, "0", so "\\{0\\}" for your first regexp pattern).
trans-unit.target: 这是因为 Array 的 slice 将把 arguments 所有内容强制放入 Array 中，无论它是否是原始的，并且 key 将是每个数组元素的索引（0，1，2 ...）强制转换为字符串（例如， “ 0”，因此您的第一个正则表达式模式为 "\\{0\\}" 。

trans-unit.source: That's very similar to string.format:
trans-unit.target: 这和string.format非常相似。

trans-unit.source: The PHPJS project has written JavaScript implementations for many of PHP's functions. Since PHP's sprintf() function is basically the same as C's printf(), their JavaScript implementation of it should satisfy your needs.
trans-unit.target: 该PHPJS项目写JavaScript实现的许多PHP的功能。由于PHP的 sprintf() 函数与C的 printf() 基本相同，因此他们的JavaScript实现应该可以满足您的需求。

trans-unit.source: The JavaScript Date class can format localized dates and times.
trans-unit.target: JavaScript Date类可以格式化本地化的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent of sprintf("%.2e", num) is num.toExponential(2).
trans-unit.target: sprintf("%.2e", num) 的等效项是 num.toExponential(2) 。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent of sprintf("%.2f", num) in JavaScript seems to be num.toFixed(2), which formats num to 2 decimal places, with rounding (but see @ars265's comment about Math.round below).
trans-unit.target: JavaScript中的 sprintf("%.2f", num) 等效于 num.toFixed(2) ，其格式将 num 舍入为小数点后2位（但请参见下面的@ ars265关于 Math.round 的评论）。

trans-unit.source: Then I call it:
trans-unit.target: 那我就叫它。

trans-unit.source: There is "sprintf" for JavaScript which you can find at http://www.webtoolkit.info/javascript-sprintf.html.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在http://www.webtoolkit.info/javascript-sprintf.html上找到JavaScript的“ sprintf” 。

trans-unit.target: 这个方案比较适合。

trans-unit.source: To print numbers in base B, try num.toString(B). JavaScript supports automatic conversion to and from bases 2 through 36 (in addition, some browsers have limited support for base64 encoding).
trans-unit.target: 要在基数B中打印数字，请尝试 num.toString(B) 。JavaScript支持从2到36的自动转换（此外，某些浏览器对base64编码的支持有限）。

trans-unit.target: 尝试sprintf（）for JavaScript。
